current_lane_scenario_description.normal_lane: You are driving on a road with {edge_num} lanes in your direction, and you are currently driving in the number {left_lane_num} lane from the left. The length of the current lane is {lane_length} m.
current_lane_scenario_description.junction_lane: You are driving on a junction.

next_lane_scenario_description.normal_lane: The type of next road is normal lane, and the number of the next road is {edge_num}.
next_lane_scenario_description.junction_lane: The type of next road is junction {tl_state} a traffic light. The stop line at the junction is {dis_stop_line} meters ahead of you.
next_lane_scenario_description.none: The next lane is too far to consider.

basic_description.traffic_info_description: The limit speed of the current lane is {speed_limit} m/s.
basic_description.traffic_light_change_des: The traffic lights will change to {color} in {time} seconds.
basic_description.ego_state_description: Your current position is {ego_position}, speed is {ego_speed} m/s, acceleration is {ego_acceleration} m/s^2, and lane position is {ego_lane_position} m.

other_vehicle_description.surrond_vehicle_on_normal_description: - Vehicle '{sv_id}' is driving on {lane_relative_position} and is {relative_position} of you. The position of it is {sv_position}, speed is {sv_speed} m/s, acceleration is {sv_acceleration} m/s^2, and lane position is {sv_lane_position} m. The distance between you and vehicle '{sv_id}' is {distance} m.
other_vehicle_description.surrond_vehicle_on_junction_description: - Vehicle '{sv_id}' is driving on the same junction as you and will have collision with you. The speed of it is {sv_speed} m/s, acceleration is {sv_acc} m/s^2. The collision will occur at {ego_s} m in front of you, {sv_s} m in front of the vehicle '{sv_id}'. The time required for you to reach the collide point is {ego_time} s, and the time required for vehicle '{sv_id}' to reach the collide point is {sv_time} s.
other_vehicle_description.no_other_vehicle: There are no other vehicles driving near you, so you can drive completely according to your own ideas.

last_decision_description.basic: The last action you made {delta_time} s ago was {decision}.
last_decision_description.changing_lane: The lane change is not completed yet. You are changing lane to the {direction} of the current lane.
last_decision_description.changed_lane: The lane change has been completed.

import_description.traffic_notice: Attention, you are approaching a junction with a traffic light.
import_description.change_lane_notice: You should turn {direction} in the next junction. Please change lanes to the number {index} lane on your {direction}. The stop line at the junction is {dis_stop_line} meters ahead of you, you'd better change lanes {dis_change_lane} m behind the stop line.

intension.basic: - Your driving intension is to drive safety and avoid collisions while reaching the destination as quickly as possible.
intension.traffic_light: - Cross junctions only when the light is green, and wait inside the stop line when the light is red.
intension.junction: - To be safe, you need to slow down to 5 m/s^2 when approaching 30 meters from the stop line.
intension.high_speed: - Keep your speed below the road speed limit.
intension.other_vehicles: - Watch out for the car ahead, the safe distance between you and other car is 10 meters.

navigation_instruction.straight: Stay in the current lane and continue straight ahead.
navigation_instruction.left: Change to the left lane as soon as possible.
navigation_instruction.right: Change to the right lane as soon as possible.
